thread.title: Concierge Anthony Bosco you went above and Beyond
thread.title_full: Concierge Anthony Bosco you went above and Beyond - Review of Archer Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: MariadelosA
title: Concierge Anthony Bosco you went above and Beyond
text: Although I was not staying there, my Niece was there to spend her birthday. I wanted to do something special, a little surprise and I was so fortunate to have Anthony's help. I was stressed he was calm; he offered me ideas and then resolved everything for me like I was standing in front of him. Anthony, people like you who care and go beyond to help others are hard to find!!! Thank you from me and from my Niece... you helped make it even more special
